messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Puzzling Park Perplexity DATE: 11/11/11 The courtroom was filled with earnest discussion as the trial ensued. The defense brought forth the officers integral to the investigation to elucidate on their insights. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Please state your name and role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Captain A. B. Clark, the principal investigator in this case. DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Thank you, Captain Clark. Can you narrate the events on the day the perplexity was found? WITNESS: Certainly. On the afternoon of August 8th, Officer C. D. Davis discovered a puzzling scene at the park and reported it. The investigation began shortly after. DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Who was tasked with evidence analysis? WITNESS: Sergeant E. F. Evans and Technician G. H. Hall conducted the analysis of the evidence collected. DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Who managed the suspect interrogations? WITNESS: Detective I. J. Jackson and Detective K. L. Lee took charge of the interrogations of suspects and potential witnesses. DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Thank you. No further inquiries. The Prosecution conducted a comprehensive cross-examination of Captain Clark regarding the investigative methods. Throughout the trial, Patrol Officer M. N. Nelson, Patrol Officer O. P. Owen, and Patrol Officer Q. R. Rice were also summoned to testify.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
